function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Possible COVID-19 spreading due to lack of social isolation","Impact":"Widespread spread of the disease, overwhelming healthcare system","Mitigation":"Enforcement of social isolation measures, lockdown strategy","Technologies":"Agent-based modeling, traffic data analysis","People":"General population","Owner":"Government, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Ineffective control of the disease with low isolation rates","Impact":"Prolonged duration of the pandemic, increased risk of virus mutation","Mitigation":"Increased isolation rates, effective case isolation, international travel restrictions","Technologies":"Agent-based modeling, socio-economic data analysis","People":"General population","Owner":"Government, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Failure to implement recommended control strategies (e.g., universal mask use and social distancing)","Impact":"Continued spread of the pandemic, increased risk of infection","Mitigation":"Promotion of universal mask use, social distancing measures","Technologies":"Agent-based modeling","People":"General population","Owner":"Government, public health authorities"}]}
